summary: A family moves to a small town in California where they plan on starting a new life while running a long-abandoned funeral home. The locals fear the place, which is suspected to be on haunted ground.
cast: Dan Byrd|Denise Crosby|Stephanie Patton|Alexandra Adi|Rocky Marquette|Courtney Peldon|Bug Hall|Tarah Paige|Michael Shamus Wiles|Adam Gierasch|Price Carson|Lee Garlington|Greg Travis|Christy Johnson|William Alva|Joe Langer|Paul G. Pagnini
title: Mortuary
